name: Oneiro (fyndr)
description:
Oneiro is a 1st person 3D action-adventure game in which the player travels through a surreal and sometimes disquieting dream world. The player's goal is to escape back into reality, exploring, solving puzzles, and sometimes fighting their way through the dream in the process. Each level corresponds to a different section of the dreamscape which varies greatly in terms of content.

You can view additional resources, including an instruction manual, route map, and link to a video walkthrough by visiting http://www.oneiroproject.com/
